  • Method Details

    • viewPatientProfile

      @GetMapping("/patient/view_profile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity viewPatientProfile()
      GET "patient/view_profile"
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the current patient is logged in and has an existing profile 404 NOT FOUND - if the patient is not logged in or it doesn't have a profile set up

    • updateProfile

      @PostMapping("/patient/setup_profile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateProfile(@RequestBody PatientProfileDTO userProfileDTO)
      POST "patient/setup_profile"
      Parameters:
      userProfileDTO - contains the data related to the patients profile ex. body: { "firstName": "example_firstName", "lastName": "example_lastName", "birthdate": "yyyy-mm-dd", "email": "example@email.com", "phone": "0123456789", "allergies": "example_allergy }
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the current user's profile information was successfully saved 404 NOT FOUND - if there is no user logged in 400 BAD REQUEST - if the provided data is invalid

    • getAllPrescriptionsOfPatient

      @GetMapping("/patient/prescriptions/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllPrescriptionsOfPatient()
      GET "/patient/prescriptions/all"
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the currently logged in user is a patient 404 NOT FOUND - if no currently logged in user or not a patient

    • getPrescriptionsOfCurrentPatientById

      @GetMapping("/patient/prescription/id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPrescriptionsOfCurrentPatientById(@RequestParam Integer appointmentId)
      GET "/patient/prescriptions/all?appointmentId="
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointment has an associated prescription 404 NOT FOUND - if no prescription was yet created for the given appointment or no appointment exists with the given id

    • getAllMedicalServices

      @GetMapping("/common/medical_services/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllMedicalServices()

    • exportPrescription

      @PostMapping("/patient/export_prescription") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity exportPrescription(@RequestParam Integer appointmentId)
      GET "/patient/export_prescription?appointmentId="
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointment has an associated prescription and it could be successfully exported 404 NOT FOUND - if no prescription was yet created for the given appointment or no appointment exists with the given id

    • createAppointment

      @PostMapping("/patient/appointment/new") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createAppointment(@RequestBody AppointmentDTO appointmentDTO)
      POST "/patient/appointment/new"
      Parameters:
      appointmentDTO - ex. body: { "doctorFirstName": "example_doctorFirstName", "doctorLastName": "example_doctorLastName", "medicalService": "example_medicalService" }
      Returns:
      201 CREATED - if the appointment could be successfully created 404 NOT FOUND - if no doctor was found with the given name or no medical service was found with the given name 400 BAD REQUEST - if some of the required data is missing

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      @PostMapping("/patient/appointment/update_state") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateAppointmentStatus(@RequestParam Integer appointmentId, @RequestParam String newState)
      POST "/patient/appointment/update_state?appointmentId=&newState="
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      newState - the new state
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointemnt's state could be successfully updated 405 METHOD NOT ALLOWED - if the user has no right to modfiy the state of the appointment (ex doctor) 400 BAD REQUEST - if the transition to the new state from the current state is not possible

    • getAppointmentsByStatus

      @GetMapping("/patient/appointments/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAppointmentsByStatus(@RequestParam String status)

    • getPastAppointments

      @GetMapping("/patient/appointments/past") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPastAppointments()

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      @GetMapping("/patient/appointments/upcoming") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getUpcomingAppointments()

    • searchDoctor

      @GetMapping("/common/search_doctor_by_medical_service") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity searchDoctor(@RequestParam String medicalService)

    • getDoctorProfile

      @GetMapping("/common/search_doctor_by_name") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getDoctorProfile(@RequestParam String firstName, @RequestParam String lastName)

    • getAllAppointmentStatuses

      @GetMapping("/common/appointment_statuses/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllAppointmentStatuses()
